=Cresting=



For a MS Power Point tutorial click <a href="https://docs.google.com/uc?id=0B_3QTcmnOd_BMzIxYTllNDUtMzQwMC00MWFiLWJjMWQtZGQ5YjI1ZDQ4N2Ew&export=download&hl=en_US" id="redirect"> here<a/>

for a free MS Power Point View click here http://www.microsoft.com/download/en/details.aspx?id=6

The Power Bot crester works on the principle that troop count directly affects crest drop rate and that abandoning a wild after it has been captured will fully regenerate all troops for the wild.

The Bot checks the time of the last attack and will reduce the mm sent for the trap removal wave based on the trap regeneration rate.

 # Select the city to crest from.
 # Make certain that there is an open wild spot in your castle.
 # Pick a wild of the desired level as close as possible to your city and enter the coords.
 # Enter troops to be used for attacking the wild.
 # Make certain that there is an open wild spot in your castle.
 # Keep 4 rallypoint slots open at all times.
 # Turn the crest function on.
 # Turn on auto-refresh to avoid getting stuck on "Waiting for report".


== Help Button ==

The help button will launch a pop-up window with quick instructions for the crester and troop counts from KoC Wiki. There is also a link to the wiki for additional information on cresting.
